messages.content:
"You don’t have to vote Conservative to get rid of Gordon Brown!
You don’t have to vote Labour to keep the Tories out!
Vote UKIP and really shake up British politics!"

keyPolicies.policyDescription: To save some £45million a day to help reduce Brown's Big Black Hole. To regain control of our borders.
We will raise personal allowance so that anyone working 40 hours per week on the minimum wage will not pay income tax. Above this tax will be at a flat rate of 31% with no National Insurance.

A radical shake up of benefits to make a much simpler system. UKIP would only allow entitlement to welfare benefits after a minimum waiting period of five years and on proving British residency for those who continuously entered the country with a valid work contract or for reasons of marriage to a British citizen. Anyone who had entered the country under any other circumstances would not qualify for welfare benefits.

£130 per week for all over 65, non-taxable. To end discriminatory and complex means testing on pensions, UKIP would roll-out existing state pensions over the next parliament. Pensioners that are not a net drain on the economy and don’t claim state fuel allowance; a non-taxable ‘Citizen’s Pension’.
We will bring our Armed Forces up to full strength, support NATO and ensure that personnel from the EU is properly looked after with equipment, pay, housing and aftercare.

issues.brexitEurope: Withdrawal from the EU to regain control of our borders.

Anyone who had entered the country under any other circumstances would not qualify for welfare benefits.

contactInformation.address: UK Independence Party, PO Box 408, Newton Abbot, Devon, TQ12 9BG
